name: Pixel
description: Pixel is a retro-inspired oscilloscope-themed robot who is a proud member of the WebtrES club. With its box-shaped retro console body and button controls, Pixel brings a touch of nostalgia to the digital world. Its arms and legs are equipped with rocket boosters, allowing it to move swiftly and with precision. The screen on its console displays a classic game of snake, providing hours of entertainment. Additionally, Pixel wears trendy glasses that enhance its visual processing capabilities. This combination of old-school charm and advanced technology makes Pixel a unique and sought-after member of the WebtrES club.
